item.g:title: Rajnigandha Pan Masala Rs. 11.00 - Pack of 40
item.g:description: Rajnigandha Pan Masala is a premium Pan Masala offering from 90 years old legacy of DS Group. Perfect blend of precious ingredients and aromatic flavors including Betelnut, Catechu, Lime and Cardamom seeds, Rajnigandha has been the first choice of connoisseurs of Pan Masala. Rajnigandha stands for taste of excellence that salutes the spirit of patrons of Pan Masala, who believe only in the best. Weight : 88g, Pack : Intermediate Carton, Quantity: Pack of 40

item.g:title: Rajnigandha Meetha ₹ 300.00 Pack
item.g:description: Relish the sweeter moments of life with new Rajnigandha Meetha, new sweet Pan Masala from Rajnigandha. Perfect blend of precious ingredients and aromatic flavours including Khajoor, Supari, Katha, Lime and Elaichi .Enjoy the truly authentic Meetha paan experience now.

item.g:title: Rajnigandha Saffron ₹ 350.00 Pack
item.g:description: Some treasured achievements deserve to be celebrated with something just as rare. Rajnigandha Saffron, a perfect blend of best handpicked saffron, exotic flavours, and precious ingredients, offers you the rich taste that these moments truly deserve.

item.g:title: Rajnigandha Pearls ₹ 60.00 Pack
item.g:description: Rajnigandha Pearls are handpicked cardamom seeds that are blended with the best quality saffron and are coated with glittering silver leaves. Rajnigandha Pearls is our traditional mouth freshener in a modern avatar with a true fusion of heart melting taste and superb freshness that will surely entice every taste bud.

item.g:title: Garam Masala-100g
item.g:description: A blend of many hand-picked, exotic spices, Catch Garam Masala infuses aroma and flavor to any dish, making it everyone’s favourite.

item.g:title: Ksheer Cow Ghee ₹ 730.00 Pack
item.g:description:
Ensuring quality and freshness in every drop, Ksheer dairy products are renowned for their purity, taste and range of health benefits.
Ksheer Dairy Products strives to spread good health across the nation by sourcing best quality milk directly from local farmers and processed in world-class facility at Reengus, Rajasthan.
Ksheer means milk in Sanskrit and is derived from Ksheer Sagar- the mythical ocean of milk and the abode of Lord Vishnu that signifies purity and quality.

item.g:title: LuvIt Eclairs Rs 50 Master Pouch
item.g:description: Rich and Soft Eclairs that offer a burst of chocolaty goodness with every bite. Every bite of LuvIt Eclairs is a delightful mix of Chocolate & Caramel that melts in your mouth making it the perfect treat for kids and adults

item.g:title: Pulse Kachcha Aam Candy ₹ 60.00 Pack
item.g:description: Pulse candy has found a place in everybody's hearts since its launch in 2015. With a tangy core and a hard-boiled exterior, this candy is a perfect blend of a fruity and a tangy twist. Thus, it manages to package the Kachcha Aam flavour and bring it to you in tiny packets of excitement. You too, can add tanginess to every moment of life with Pulse Kachcha Aam candy and add a punch of excitement to your day.

item.g:title: Coriander Powder-100g
item.g:description: Made from the freshest coriander seeds, roasted at a perfect temperature with LTG process, Catch Coriander Powder lends an unmatched aromatic touch to any dish.

item.g:title: Red Chilli Powder-100g
item.g:description: The Kitchens of India are getting filled with more and more products of Catch Sprinklers range. The latest to join the shelf is Catch Red Chilli Flakes – for that extra edge on pizzas and garlic breads.
